about_the_game:
Inspirational Vol.3 explores emotional pieces, epic songs and modern staples!

The third volume of the Inspirational series delves into the ambient and intense world of emotion, including themes enhanced with female vocals. Then the music jumps into the intense world of epic themes, ranging from orchestral battles to elaborate villain themes and more. Lastly, there's a medley of modern themes - including perfect songs for swanky city life and modern combat.

Features:

  • 12 Emotional Tracks, 13 Epic Tracks, and 12 Modern Tracks - 37 in total!
  • Large variety of instruments and sounds
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects

Tracklist:

1 - A Universe at Hand

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: RPG Maker MV - Inspirational Vol. 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
